pr_title: Added IsEmpty operation for filter predicate

timeline.message: Added IsEmpty operation for filter predicate

timeline.author: PatRolland

timeline.bodyText: i feel like only collection and map should be handled here
timeline.author: PatRolland

replies.bodyText: So the string "" is not considered empty?
replies.author: Chandrasekar-Rajasekar

replies.bodyText:
So we generate JPQL queries based on IS EMPTY and IS NOT EMPTY.  I'm not sure those will work on Strings when we push this to the datastore.
I'm inclined to think the JPQL queries will blow up if we try this on Strings in the DB.  Either remove the String case - or we need to add explicit tests to see that they work as expected.
replies.author: aklish

timeline.bodyText: null and empty do not represent the same state imo
timeline.author: PatRolland

replies.bodyText: For in memory stores, we'll need to check if the field is null OR if the collection is empty. This is the requirement given in the issue.
replies.author: Chandrasekar-Rajasekar

replies.bodyText: I agree - they are not the same thing.  But I think you could interpret this either way.
replies.author: aklish

replies.bodyText:
if you look at it in a db table way, a column referring to children might be null or have a value with no associations .
consider 3 tables
TableA(a_id), TableB(b_id) and TableAB(ab_id, a_id, b_id).
You might end up with a row in TableAB such as ab_id = 1, a_id = 1 and b_id = null thus representing an empty collection.
You migth also end up having no row in TableAB thus representing a null collection.
I'm not sure if this is a concept worth representing in the =isempty= filter but that is how I can represent the distinction here.
replies.author: PatRolland

replies.bodyText: We'll run a test and see what JPQL does.  The in-memory result should match the JPQL result.
replies.author: aklish

replies.bodyText: Makes sense. Is there a way where I could make the distinction between an absence of association between and an empty one then? I feel like is isNull and isEmpty operators would clash in some way.
replies.author: PatRolland

timeline.message: Allow filter on ismany relationship for isempty operation. Add It test
exclude isnull check on attribute collection
skip query on attribute collection test
ieEmpty returns false if there is null association
Add exception if toMany association exist on the path and is not target collection

timeline.author: aklish
